title: Penne Nee Illammal Lyrics Bramman Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: Penne Nee Illammal
Singer(s): Karthik, M M Manasi
Music: Devi Sri Prasad
Movie: Bramman 

Unnkannai Paarthaale 
manasellaam alayosai
alayosai alayosai 
alayosai alayosai

Unpechai kettale 
manasellam pudhu baashai
pudhu baashai, pudhu baashai, 
pudhu baashai, pudhu baashai

Vendaam ena sonna podhum 
kangal thaedudhey
kaanam ena nenjam vaadudhey.
Pogum vazhi engum pookkal 
sindhi moodudhey
ullam unai mattum naadudhey.

Penne nee illaamal 
naan poga paadhai illaye.
Oh oh pene nee illaamal 
en vazhakkai muttrupulliye.

Mudhal kadhal endraal 
mazhayum veyilum adhil 
vaanam vandhu villaai valayum

en ulagam endraal
neeyum naanum adhil
kaalam neram ellaam karaiyum

Thaniyaaga vazhndha kaalam
thaandi pogum neram
thaedi vandaai neeyum podhaadhaa!

Ada nettru nalla thookkam
indru yeno yekkam
kadhal seiyyum kaayam aaraadhaa?

Penne nee illaamal 
naan poga paadhai illaye.
Oh oh pene nee illaamal 
en vazhakkai muttrupulliye.

Naan kannai thirakkira neram 
edhire dhinam unnai
paarkkanum mudhalil uyire.

En kangal urangidum munne
adhile dhinam kanavaai
nulaivadhu needhaan uyire.

Unnai ullangaiyil vaiththu
regai pole thaithu
thaanga pogum naalai thandhaaye.

Kedigaaram mullaai naanum
unnai suttra vendum
neram nirkka vendum angaeye.

Penne nee illaamal 
naan poga paadhai illaye.
Oh oh pene nee illaamal 
en vazhakkai muttrupulliye.
